tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I had a broken tooth due to decay hence it was an emergency however Dr Salil was very prompt in extracting the remaining tooth and even did root canal for adjoining teeth while putting a bridge with in two sittings so as to ensure I can eat normal.

His clinic and the staff are also very caring while the costs are competitive.

I found his services are excellent.

I strongly recommend him for any dental problems while suggesting a proactive care for all.

It was my second visit with the doctor and got my problem permanently treated in just 2 sittings.

I had chronic pain for which I have visited many doctors, but the pain was arrogant enough to stay.

Kudos to the Doctor.
